tool.name: Sunny Sample Generator
tool.command: export out_folder=\$(cat $output_folder) && mkdir -p \$out_folder && export out_folder=\$(realpath \$out_folder) && #if not $varExists('__job_resource.__job_resource__select') or $__job_resource.__job_resource__select=='no' or not $varExists('__job_resource.remote_resource_cloud_nersc') or $__job_resource.remote_resource_cloud_nersc=='orc' : pixi run --as-is --manifest-path /app app --nproc $nproc --data-dir \$out_folder --nsamps $nsampl > >(tee -a $output) 2> >(tee -a $output >&2) && #else module load julia/1.12.1 && export JULIA_DEPOT_PATH=/global/cfs/cdirs/m1503/maiqmag/julia_depot && julia --project=/global/cfs/cdirs/m1503/maiqmag/sunny /global/cfs/cdirs/m1503/maiqmag/sunny/src/sunny/sunny.jl --data-dir \$out_folder --nsamps $nsampl > >(tee -a $output) 2> >(tee -a $output >&2) && #end if mkdir outputs && ln -s \$out_folder/* outputs
tool.help:
**Sunny**
This is a Galaxy tool for Sunny Sample Generator.
For more information, see the repository: https://code.ornl.gov/ndip/tool-sources/spectroscopy/sunny
